membership.canceledFreeTrialSecondText: Your free trial has been canceled. Your Unlimited access lasts until {nextPayment}.
membership.canceledSubscriptionSecondTex: Your subscription has been canceled. Your Unlimited access lasts until {nextPayment}.
membership.freeTrialFirstText: Your free trial began on {purchaseDate}. Your yearly subscription will start on {nextPayment}.
membership.freeTrialSecondText: If you would like to stop recurring payments, you can do so using the Cancel Subscription button below. Please do so at least 24 hours prior to the free trial end date to ensure you are not charged.
membership.memberSecondText: If you would like to stop recurring payments, you can do so using the Cancel Subscription button below. Please do so at least 24 hours prior to your Unlimited membership renewal date to ensure you are not charged.

membership.paymentMadeOnGoogle: Your payment was made through Google Play, please visit your Google Play account to manage your subscriptions.

product.termsPWA: Payment is charged upon confirmation of purchase or at the end of the free trial (if applicable). Your membership will renew automatically unless you cancel your subscription. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period.
productPayment.authoriseFreeTrialTerms: By clicking Pay you confirm you have permission from the registered card holder. We won’t charge you during your free trial. Payment is charged at the end of the free trial (if applicable), and your membership will renew every month unless you cancel your subscription. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. See the full terms {link}.
productPayment.authoriseTerms: You hereby authorise OTRO to charge you automatically every {validityPeriod} unless you cancel your subscription. Full terms are available {link}.
profile.invite_friends_description: هل تعرف شخص قد يحب OTRO ؟ أرسل له دعوة
purchase.no_products: There was a problem with loading the products. Please try again.
purchase.termsApple: Payment is charged by iTunes upon confirmation of purchase or at the end of a free trial (if applicable). Your membership will automatically renew unless you cancel your subscription at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Subscriptions may be managed by you and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to your App Store Account Settings after purchase.The price of a monthly or yearly OTRO membership can be found in the Settings area. The length of the free trial (if available) can be found in the Account section in Settings.
purchase.termsGoogle: Payment is charged by Google Play upon confirmation of purchase or at the end of a free trial (if applicable). Your membership will automatically renew unless you cancel your subscription at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Subscriptions may be managed by you and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the section ‘Subscriptions’ in Google Play after purchase.The price of a monthly or yearly OTRO membership can be found in the Settings area. The length of the free trial (if available) can be found in the Account section in Settings.
